bs-permissionmanager-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of permission manager extension
prefs-permissionmanager:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for permission manager section in preferences.
{{Identical|Permission manager}}
bs-permissionmanager-text: Label for global actions menu entry
bs-permissionmanager-grouping-global:
Column headline for namespace independent permissions
{{Identical|Namespace independent permissions}}
bs-permissionmanager-grouping-local:
Column headline for namespace specific permissions
{{Identical|Namespace specific permissions}}
bs-permissionmanager-pref-enablerealityc: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for activate permission check
bs-permissionmanager-error-lockout: Error message for changes in settings that couldn't be saved, because some essential rights are not enabled for any user group.
log-name-bs-permission-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type
log-description-bs-permission-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logeventslist-bs-permission-manager-log: Permission manager log option label on [[Special:Log]]
logentry-bs-permission-manager-modify:
Log message about changes in the permissions of one specific group.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the group
permissionmanager:
Anchor text for permission manager
{{Identical|Permission manager}}
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-explici:
Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is blocked by one or more groups
Parameters:
* $1 - name of the group or groups
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-inherit:
Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is inherited from one or more groups
Parameters:
* $1 - name of the group or groups
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-notset: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is not set
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-explici: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is explicitly set
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-setonwi: Flyout shown in permission grid when a right is set on wiki level
bs-permissionmanager-group-all:
Label for '*' group in Group tree
{{Identical|All}}
bs-permissionmanager-hint: Flyout text showing all permissions included in the role
bs-permissionmanager-write-config-file-e: Text of error message when configuration file is not writable
bs-premissionmanager-reset-button-label:
Label for the button that resets all unsaved changes
{{Identical|Reset}}
logentry-bs-permission-manager-global-ad: Log message when user adds global role(s) to a group. $4 - Group, $5 - added roles, $6 - count of roles added
logentry-bs-permission-manager-global-re: Log message when user removes global role(s) from a group. $4 - Group, $5 - removed roles, $6 - count of roles removed
logentry-bs-permission-manager-ns-add: Log message when user adds role(s) to a group in a namespace. $4 - Group, $5 - added roles, $6 - count of roles added, $7 - namespace name
logentry-bs-permission-manager-ns-remove: Log message when user removes role(s) from a group in a namespace. $4 - Group, $5 - removed roles, $6 - count of roles removed, $7 - namespace name
bs-permissionmanager-affected-by-depende:
Warning message when role requires a permission that is not available.
$1 - permission name, 
$2 - roles containing this permission, 
$3 - number of roles containing this permission

Warning message holding single messages on permission requirements.
$1 - all the permissions required
bs-permissionmanager-preset-custom-help: Help message for the permission preset "custom"
bs-permissionmanager-preset-private-help: Help message for the permission preset "private"
bs-permissionmanager-preset-protected-he: Help message for the permission preset "protected"
bs-permissionmanager-preset-public-help: Help message for the permission preset "public"
bs-permissionmanager-switch-preset-confi: Confirmation message when switching to a different preset
bs-permissionmanager-preset-save-error: Error message when API call to change the preset failed
bs-permissionmanager-preset-save-success: Success message when saving the preset selection succeeded
bs-permissionmanager-group-not-found: Error message when a group is not found
bs-permissionmanager-groupmanager-invali:
Error message that the group name contains an invalid character or invalid characters
*$1 is the number of invalid characetares
*$2 are the invalid characters
Error message that the group name cannot be longer than 16 characters.
Error message that the group name needs to have at least one character.
bs-permissionmanager-group-already-exist: Error message that the group already exists
bs-permissionmanager-group-create-label: Form title for creating new groups
bs-permissionmanager-group-create: Button label to create a new group
bs-permissionmanager-group-remove-confir:
Confirmation message when removing a group.
$1 - name of the group
bs-permissionmanager-edit-group: Title for the edit group dialog
bs-permissionmanager-advanced-switch-con: Warning if the user tries to switch to the advanced mode while there are unsaved changes
bs-permission-manager-simple-matrix-glob: Heading label for global permission section
bs-permission-manager-simple-matrix-name: Heading label for namespace permission section
bs-permissionmanager-simple-inherited: Notice when role is granted by inheritance
bs-permissionmanager-simple-explicit: Notice when role is granted explicitly
bs-permissionmanager-simple-setonwiki: Notice when role is granted on a nemespace by inheriting from global permissions
bs-permissionmanager-simple-setonwiki-su: Additional notice when role is granted on a namespace by inheriting from global permissions
bs-permissionmanager-simple-blocked:
Notice when role is blocked.
* $1 - name of the group or groups having the role
* $2 - count of groups having the role
bs-permissionmanager-simple-blocked-sub: Additional notice when role is blocked.
bs-permissionmanager-simple-notset: Notice when role is not set
bs-permission-manager-simple-matrix-grou:
Panel heading letting user know which group's permissions are being edited.
$1- group name
bs-permissionmanager-group-header-implic: Label of the section showing implicit groups
bs-permissionmanager-group-header-groups: Label of the section showing custom and built-in groups
bs-permissionmanager-group-disable-edit: Button label to disable group editing mode
bs-permissionmanager-group-enable-edit: Button label to enable group editing mode
